summary: Mechanical Design Engineer with a proven track record in R&D, manufacturing, and project leadership. Proficient in CAD modeling and product development, with strong communication skills and a Lean manufacturing mindset. Experienced with Autodesk Inventor, AutoCAD, SolidWorks, and Revit; adept at collaborating across cross-functional teams to drive design improvements and process efficiencies.

experience.title: Mechanical Designer
experience.description: Design ammonia processing control units using Autodesk Inventor. Create working drawings for the shop floor. Update and advise on changes to P&ID as needed. Consult project managers on design changes. Solve problems on the shop floor. 5+ years of CAD modeling. Assisted with design of engineering projects, including products, parts and components. Read and interpreted blueprints and created engineering drawings and sketches. Collaborated with purchasing to obtain samples for process validation. Attended cross-functional product meetings to discuss sourcing, lead times, and production schedules. Managed continuous improvement projects aligned with category strategies.

experience.title: AutoCAD Drafter and Lathe Operator
experience.description: Reverse engineered parts to create fabrication drawings. Maintained and updated drawings. Manufactured parts on the lathe. Polished parts to remove blemishes and cleaned parts for vacuum packing. Read and interpreted blueprints and created drawings and sketches. Used CAD programs to create detailed designs and specifications.

experience.title: NC Programmer/Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Programmed parts using CNC software. Opened work orders for the shop floor. Printed drawings for work orders. Performed price quotes for outside work and ran CNC machines when needed.

experience.title: Laser Operator
experience.description: Ran CNC programs on Trumpf Trumatic L260, L4030 laser and punch/laser systems. Performed maintenance to keep machines in excellent working condition.

experience.title: Shear Operator
experience.description: Cut sheet metal blanks to size according to job requirements.

experience.title: Polisher
experience.description: Deburred all parts and sharp edges.

experience.title: Parts Sales/Commercial Sales Account Manager
experience.description: Opened and closed the store for business. Maintained the store safe. Kept parts inventory up to date and accurate. Served as Stores Commercial Sales Manager.

education.degree: Associates of Applied Science in Computer Drafting and Design

certifications: Trumpf Laser Operator Course (June 18, 1999) - Trumpf Inc
Advanced Custom Training Certification (MLC CAD SYSTEMS)
Power Plant Certifications (Aviation Maintenance - Power Plant) - Delgado Community College
